content:
Craft an item of type: diorite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "skeleton_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 23}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 28, "index": 24}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 7, "index": 26}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 52, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 31}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "cooked_porkchop", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft diorite slabs I need to place 3 diorite in a row on the crafting table. The first diorite is placed at slot 1.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: diorite_slab

thought: The second diorite is placed at slot 2 which is adjacent to the first diorite.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 45 to slot 3 with quantity 1
